summary: The module contains a set of Django test utilities and test cases that define simple models and extensively verify the behavior and configuration validation of Django's ModelAdmin interface, covering admin options, form handling, fieldsets, inlines, pagination, ordering, search, and related regressions.
business_intent: To automatically validate that ModelAdmin configurations are correctly enforced and that custom admin implementations behave as expected, preventing misconfigurations and regressions in Django admin functionality.
